salesOrder

${model.f_comment}

Attribute Help / Comment Format Attributes
uid  Help
The globally unique identifier.
  		uid
max length: 30
allows( printable ) 		pk
required
 
number  Help
The human-readable number that identifies this order. This value is usually assigned automatically based on the OrderNumber table.
  		name
max length: 50
allows( printable ) 		required
 
statusCode  Help
A summary of the order's status.
  		letterCode
max length: 1
allows( letters ) 		required
 
holdUntilUtcTs  Help
Indicates the order is on hold, and that the on-hold status should be automatically removed at a particular date and time.
  		timestamp  
expedite  Help
Indicates if the order should be expedited. Some screens and processes will prioritize expedited orders. This must be used sparingly or it will have no practical effect.
  		boolean required
 
taxExempt  Help
Indicates if the order is exempt from sales tax.
  		boolean required
 
taxRate  Help
The percentage of sales tax to apply. This is ignored if the order is tax exempt.
  		double required
 
discountRate  Help
The default discount rate used for customers associated with this tier. This is typically defaulted based on the customer's discount rate.
  		double required
 
totalPrice  Help
The total price. This is simply an aggregate of the order's lines.
  		money required
 
totalTax  Help
The total tax. This is simply an aggregate of the order's lines.
  		money required
 
lockVersion  Help
This is used to coordinate optimistic locking in the database. This is usually not displayed.
  		lockVersion  
statusName  Help
A summary of the order's status.
  		name
max length: 50
allows( printable ) 		 
holdUntilLocalTs  Help
Indicates the order is on hold, and that the on-hold status should be automatically removed at a particular date and time.
  		timestamp  
holdUntilLocalTsMessage  Help
Indicates the order is on hold, and that the on-hold status should be automatically removed at a particular date and time.
  		text100
max length: 100
allows( printable ) 		 
holdUntilLocalDate  Help
Indicates the order is on hold, and that the on-hold status should be automatically removed at a particular date and time.
  		date  
holdUntilLocalTime  Help
Indicates the order is on hold, and that the on-hold status should be automatically removed at a particular date and time.
  		time
